entity.name: Varun Moka
entity.description: A climate-tech advocate dedicated to enhancing transparency in corporate sustainability. My focus is on developing robust tools to track carbon footprints across complex supply chains, moving beyond conventional ESG metrics. I believe current reporting often fails to capture the full scope of environmental impact, and I aim to provide a more accurate and holistic view for organizations and the public alike.

projects.name: GoCarbonTracker
projects.description: GoCarbonTracker is an open-source platform that aggregates and analyzes sustainability data from diverse sources, including corporate ESG reports, third-party data providers, and Science Based Targets initiative (SBTi) commitments. It provides a comprehensive view of an organization's supply chain carbon footprint, categorized by industry for relevant benchmarking. The primary goal is to empower the public, especially a younger, climate-conscious demographic, to easily access and understand the true environmental impact of corporations, fostering accountability and driving progress towards genuine net-zero goals.

It will cover essential costs such as cloud hosting for the platform, data acquisition from third-party sources, and allow for dedicated development time to build the core features and data aggregation engine.
